titles.title: To amend the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act relating to the minimum amount of State grants for any fiscal year under that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 9/24/1999--Introduced. Amends the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA) to change the maximum amount to the minimum amount which a State may receive as a grant for any fiscal year for assistance for education of all children with disabilities.
